pages.text: $(italic)You almost lost your head yourself while searching for a Wither Skeleton with a spine loose enough to drop its skull. Heads up, you never were the one to bury your head in the sand.$(br2)As if struck by lightning you thought out a new enchantment.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Occasionally drops mob heads on kill.$(br2)Max Level: 3$(br)Applicable to melee weapons.$(br)Mutually exclusive with Looting.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a common Book with Treasure Hunter by surrounding your Enchanter with Pigment and the other required materials.

pages.title: Enchantment Upgrading
pages.text: Upgrading Treasure Hunter from level 1 to level 2 is fairly cheap at first.$(br)This price will quickly increase to more and more Pigment and Experience for each additional level.
